ygData.subject: Re: Grouping issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, I prefer the auto-split on, and one person gets all the loot. When finished, go to town, and whoever has best faction sells the loot, and
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, I prefer the auto-split on, and one
person gets all the loot. When finished, go to town, and
whoever has best faction sells the loot, and everything
gets split evenly.<br><br>The other way we split loot
is by turns... after a kill everyone takes turns
looting. If someone gets something you want, you buy it
from them. Often, in my regular group, if you ask for
something they will simply give it to you. It's a good idea
to offer to pay for it anyway. Polite, ya' know?
